app.title: Local Competitor Analyzer
app.description: Analyze your local competition with AI-powered insights

header.title: Local Competitor Analyzer
header.subtitle: Register your business and discover nearby competitors with AI-powered analysis

list.title: Your Businesses
list.empty: No businesses registered yet. Add your first business above.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Business
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will also delete all associated reports.

sections.noCompetitors: No competitors found in the nearby area.

history.title: Report History
history.empty: No reports have been generated for this business yet.

businessRegistered.title: Business registered
businessRegistered.description: Your business has been successfully registered.

reportGenerated.title: Report generated
reportGenerated.description: Your competitor analysis report is ready.

reportDownloaded.title: Report downloaded
reportDownloaded.description: HTML report has been saved to your downloads.

printDialogOpened.title: Print dialog opened
printDialogOpened.description: Use 'Save as PDF' option to save as PDF.

emailClientOpened.title: Email client opened
emailClientOpened.description: Your default email app has been opened with the report summary.

addressSearch.enterAddress: Please enter an address to search
addressSearch.searchFailed: Failed to search for address. Please try again.
addressSearch.locationObtainedDesc: Your current location has been captured successfully.
addressSearch.locationFailed: Could not get your location. Please check your browser settings and try again.
addressSearch.locationDenied: Location access was denied. Please enable location permissions in your browser settings to use this feature.
addressSearch.coordinatesRequired: Valid location coordinates are required for competitor analysis.
addressSearch.proceedingWithAddressDesc: Business will be registered with pending location. Reports cannot be generated until location is verified.

multipleResults.title: Multiple Locations Found
multipleResults.description: We found several businesses at this address. Please select the correct one:

suggestion.title: Address Found
suggestion.description: We found a matching business with a more complete address. Would you like to use it?

noResults.title: Address Not Found
noResults.description: We couldn't verify this address. You can try a more specific address, use your current location, or proceed with the entered address (reports will be unavailable until location is verified).

apiKeyMissing.title: Address Validation Unavailable
apiKeyMissing.description: Address validation is temporarily unavailable. You can use your current location or proceed with the entered address (reports will be unavailable until location is verified).

locationStatus.pendingNote: Reports unavailable until location is verified
